title: Symbolism Happens!
description:
One of the criticisms I get is how by saying something is symbolic, I am somehow suggesting that it is not describing an event in the world.  This stems from a deep misunderstanding of what symbolism is.  Symbolism is not so much an arbitrary allegorical representation of something, but rather the very pattern by which we notice meaning.

Article on St-Peter and St-Paul: https://www.orthodoxartsjournal.org/st-peter-on-the-right-st-paul-on-the-left/

Events Calendar:
https://thesymbolicworld.com/events/

My links:
Support this channel: https://thesymbolicworld.com/support/

patreon: http://www.patreon.com/pageauvideos
subscribestar: http://www.subscribestar.com/jonathanpageau
paypal: http://www.paypal.me/JonathanPageau

website: http://www.thesymbolicworld.com
facebook: http://www.facebook.com/TheSymbolicWorld.com
twitter: http://www.twitter.com/pageaujonathan

My website designers,  Anomalist Design: https://www.anomalistdesign.com/

The music at the opening is Russian Eastern Overture, by Rimsky Korsakov.
